description:
JOIN OVER 600 STUDENTS ALREADY TAKING THIS COURSE!

Update: Course last updated April 2016

This is one of the most comprehensive courses on Effective Business Networking available on Udemy!

By taking this course, you'll be able to grow your network. As a result, you'll have deeper relationships with your colleagues, get better clients, and of course, make more money.

This course is perfect for you even if you don't consider yourself a "people person" and you dread the thought of going to networking events.

I myself am one of those people! I'm the classic introvert who would rather stay at home over going to one of those events where I have to schmooze and small talk. Yuck!

That said, I've figured out how to build a large network of colleagues, clients, and other professionals all of whom have helped me to grow my business in some way.

In fact, because of the network I created, I was able to take my business online and move to the Caribbean together with my family.

If I can do it, so can you!

In this course, I detail everything you need including how to:

  • Use key mental triggers to help others open up to you
  • Know what the real "magic word" is when it comes to networking
  • Answer the question, "What do you do?" in a way that gets people wanting to know more
  • Spot your ideal client from across the room and focus on only them
  • Avoid events that will waste your time
  • Skip the small talk that wastes time and money
  • Use your body language to get people to respond positively before you even say a word
  • Ask powerful questions that will give you amazing insight
  • Know exactly how and when to follow up key contacts
  • Know how to form a dream team and take your networking to the next level

The main reason you should take this course is if you're interested in making your networking efforts actually pay off. If you want better clients and to grow your business, consider taking this course.

The main questions answered in this course include:

  • how to network for business
  • how to network effectively
  • networking for introverts
  • the right way to network
  • successful networking hacks
  • how to network the right way
  • and more!

Through networking effectively, I built a solid business and was able to take off with my family on an international adventure.

Now, through this Udemy course, it's your turn!
